channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Redirect 404 Error Page to Homepage or Custom Page with Logs
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Redirect 404 Error Page to Homepage or Custom Page with Logs

item.title: CVE-2021-24767|2024-08-03T19:42:17.031Z -- unknown -- redirect%20404%20error%20page%20to%20homepage%20or%20custom%20page%20with%20logs
item.description: The Redirect 404 Error Page to Homepage or Custom Page with Logs WordPress plugin before 1.7.9 does not check for CSRF when deleting logs, which could allow attacker to make a logged in admin delete them via a CSRF attack
